citations.narrative:
The bear enclosure has several large holes with standing water which can cause water borne parasites and
diseases. During the rainy season there is heavy rain in this area, however these holes and low line areas of
standing water need to filled as needed. A suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water.
TO BE CORRECTED: IMMEDIATELY
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.

narrative:
3.127(c)
FACILITIES, OUTDOOR. 
The bear enclosure has several large holes with standing water which can cause water borne parasites and
diseases. During the rainy season there is heavy rain in this area, however these holes and low line areas of
standing water need to filled as needed.  A suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water.
TO BE CORRECTED: IMMEDIATELY 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
